request.scenario: Building Metro Station at location. 4 lane bidge

details.reasoning: The construction of a metro station and a 4-lane bridge in Ahmedabad is expected to significantly reduce traffic congestion, thereby decreasing air pollution levels. This reduction in air pollution will have a positive impact on the health and wellbeing of residents, particularly children and the elderly. However, the construction process itself may cause temporary disruptions to local businesses and residents.
